RTCPeerConnectionGetTransceivers.summary:
The interface's
getTransceivers() method returns a list of the
objects being used to send and receive data on the
connection.
RTCPeerConnectionGetTransceivers.returns:
An array of the objects representing the transceivers
handling sending and receiving all media on the RTCPeerConnection. The list
is in the order in which the transceivers were added to the connection.
